azurerm_site_recovery_network_mapping.description: Manages a site recovery network mapping on Azure.

name.description: The name of the network mapping.

resource_group_name.description: Name of the resource group where the vault that should be updated is located.

recovery_vault_name.description: The name of the vault that should be updated.

source_recovery_fabric_name.description: Specifies the ASR fabric where mapping should be created.

target_recovery_fabric_name.description: The Azure Site Recovery fabric object corresponding to the recovery Azure region.

source_network_id.description: The id of the primary network.

target_network_id.description: The id of the recovery network.

id.description: The ID of the Site Recovery Network Mapping.

create.description: Used when creating the Site Recovery Network Mapping.

update.description: Used when updating the Site Recovery Network Mapping.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Site Recovery Network Mapping.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Site Recovery Network Mapping.
